title: NACHT, LRR and PYD domains-containing protein 3 inflammasome is activated and inhibited by berberine via toll-like receptor 4/myeloid differentiation primary response gene 88/nuclear factor-kappa B pathway, in phorbol 12-myristate 13-acetate-induced macrophages
